sentences: Suomi sijaitsee Euroopassa, joka on maanosia.
Maanosat ovat yleensä määritelty mannerlaattojen mukaan.
context: The Finnish word 'maanosa' is a compound noun formed from 'maa' (land/earth) and 'osa' (part/piece). It refers to one of the large land divisions or continents of the Earth. The term is commonly used in geography when discussing the major continental landmasses that make up our planet, such as Europe, Asia, Africa, North America, South America, Australia, and Antarctica.
